# ClassType enumeration

Information on the potential use of the class

```csharp
public enum ClassType
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Abstract | `0` | Will not have concrete instances |
| Concrete | `1` | Can have a concrete instantiation |
| Enumeration | `2` | Is an enumeration or closed values |
